resources.string: To offer an addition layer of protection we ask both parties to purchase each others items. Once both parties have completed their payment the funds will then be released in their respective accounts.
Why do I have to purchase the item if I’m swapping?

By purchasing each others items both parties are then eligible for PayPal’s purchase protection service. If, for any reason, the item your swapping with did not match the description, PayPal will return the full price including shipping.
What happens if the price of the two items are not the same?

This is completely between you and the other party. LND only offers the swapping feature to help users enhance their wardrobe. One user will either pay more or both users agree to change the prices so that it’s equal.
Thank you, your step is completed
Thank you, your order is confirmed

You will soon receive your tracking details from the seller. Once the seller ships your item the tracking details will appear on your my purchases page. You are in safe hands when shopping on Last Night’s Dress. If there is any issue with your purchase you can easily start a claim by
Your payment will not be processed until your swap partner completes their transaction.
waiting on swap partner to complete their transaction...

All sales are final on LND. However, we take an active role in each and every purchase made on LND to ensure both the buyer and seller have a great experience. A buyer may open a case with PayPal if they don\'t receive their item or the item they receive is not as described within the listing. This means a buyer cannot return an item they purchased on LND if the item simply does not fit or they no longer want the item - as long as the seller accurately described the item in the listing.
You have successfully cancelled your swap request
Thank you, you order is confirmed

You will soon receive your tracking details from the seller. Once the seller ships your item the tracking details will appear on your my purchases page.
You are in safe hands when shopping on Last Night’s Dress. If there is any issue with your purchase you can easily start a claim by
Thank you, your order is completed.
You will find your shipping label in your email. If you can not find your shipping label in your email you can simply request for a new one by clicking the tab below.
The importance of a tracking number

If the buyer claims that the item they purchased did not reach their destination, PayPal can easily validate this claim by viewing the tracking information. If you did not provide the tracking information then the buyer will win the case in most situations, If not all.
By providing a tracking number you are enhancing your customers experience.
Once you have purchased your shipping label it will be sent to your email. Please select the correct package weight or your package will not be delivered. We do not offer any shipping label over 5kg.
Tap on the camera to post your first item

"Agent style is social, stylish and loves to shop. She carries her business in the palm of her hands. She has used last night's dress to buy and sell and now is encouraging her friends to join so she and them can make more money".



Register for Agent Style and enjoy the benefits and rewards of an exciting opportunity. Remember, the sooner you join the sooner you reap the rewards. Last Night's Dress provides a spectacular mobile operating platform with an awesome administrative and sales support system.
Your are now part of our agent network
Share your code today\n to reap rewards tomorrow
Why do I need a code?

Your personal code is used to identify
 you within the agent network. Whether you actively recruit
 or not, this code tracks sales of you and the people you
 share the code with which can provide you a passive
 commission. It is simple, secure and free to use.
Benefits: All the features of being an agent will unlock. Plus you get 1.5\%% rebate on all your sales along with 1.5\%% on every sale from your team.
To qualify someone as your team member the user must use your code upon registering.\n\nMin requirement to become an Agent:
1) Min 10 posts of your own\n2) Get 5 team member to register using your code\n3) Each team member needs min 3 post each

Learn more about shipping and best practices
Avoid returns while offering the best customer experience
How to take effective photos to help maximize sales
Everything you need to know about this feature
Learn how to maximize exposure for your posts
Be confident when purchasing luxury and designer products
When you list an item, you can offer buyers one of three possible shipping options: free shipping, fixed price shipping, and actual price shipping.

Free shipping: Offering free shipping is a great way to attract more buyers. Buyers love free shipping; many will only purchase items that ship for free. In fact, buyers are more likely to choose an item with free shipping over an item with a shipping charge, even if the total cost is the same. Free shipping can pay for itself in many ways.

Fixed price shipping: Buyers can purchase your item immediately at the price you set. By selecting fixed price you can create your own shipping price. Depending on how much you charge your customers for shipping, this option can used to achieve higher sale volumes. If you choose fixed price shipping, it’s a good idea to research average shipping costs for similar items or use the Shipping Calculator to determine a fair rate. If you’re listing internationally, you can enter a separate flat fee for destinations outside your region.

Actual price shipping: Buyers would have to pay every cost associated with shipping. When you select actual price for shipping your posts will not have a shipping cost, reason being, we need to have the final destination to calculate the actual shipping cost. By choosing actual price shipping, the shipping costs are automatically calculated for your buyers in checkout. Costs are calculated based on the size and weight of the packaged item, as well as both your location and the buyer’s location.

First, sellers need to decided how much they want to charge their buyers for shipping. Again, there are three options: free, fixed price or actual price. The amount that you charge for shipping will be added to the total bill in checkout. This is extra funds deposited into your account, those funds now need to be used to purchase a shipping label.
\n\nOnce you made a sale, You have the option to purchase a shipping label directly for the app or from a third party. If you purchase a shipping label from the app then a tracking number will automatically be sent to the buyer. Alternatively, if you decide to purchase a shipping label from a third party then you need to provide the tracking number to your customers from your “Order Details” page.
Domestic shipping is mandatory to complete. If you decide to only sell domestically your products will only be visible to users within your region.

International shipping is optional. By completeing this option you are offering your item to the word. This option showcases your item to every user within the app and the chances of selling your item increases.
Once you made a sale pack your clean item in the smallest box/package possible this way you avoid dimensional weight charges.

Once you packed your item you can purchase a shipping label directly from the app or from any carrier website. Make sure you enter the exact dimensions along with the correct weight of the packaged item. Any discrepancies in these two measurements and you’ll have yourself an inaccurate shipping label which can lead to your package being returned or you will be billed for the difference.
Once you printed your shipping label tape it directly to the package. For security reasons, make sure you cover the entire shipping label with clear tape.

Once the shipping label has been taped to the package it is ready for the post office. If you do not have time to drop it off, don’t sweat it, most carrier companies allows you to arrange a pick up time.

When purchasing a shipping label directly from the app the tracking information will instantly be sent to your customer. If you decide to purchase a shipping label from a third party, then it is very important to provide you customer with the tracking information. By providing your customers with a tracking number your giving buyers a better experience when they shop from your page.
Step 3: Tape the shipping label to the box
Step 4: Drop package off at post office
Step 5: Send tracking information to your customer

1) Actual weight: Actual weight is the package weight rounded up to the next whole pound. Use a scale to determine the weight of the package. Round any fraction of a pound to the next whole pound (ex: 1.1 pound = 2 pounds). make sure you weigh your item only after its packed. It is very important to use a scale that is accurate, an inaccurate scale can weigh you package incorrectly. If the weight on the shipping label is inaccurate, you will be billed for the difference.
2) Dimensional weight: Dimensional weight reflects package density, which is the amount of the space a package occupies in relation to its actual weight.

Let’s look at DW (dimensional weight) from the perspective of a carrier since they are the ones who came up with it. Basically, carriers have a limited amount of space in their trucks, planes, and distribution centers. But they bill by weight. Let’s imagine that you wanted to ship a 1 pound box that was so big a carrier truck could only carry 5 of these boxes. Well, all carriers bills by weight, so 1 pound should come out to about $12. So this carrier truck’s entire route will only make $60 in revenue. As you probably know, this won’t be profitable for any carrier company, so they needed a way to account for this scenario. So they say “Look, no matter what that box weighs, if it’s absolutely massive, we’re going to assume it’s pretty heavy and bill you accordingly.” This is the birth of “dimensional weight”. To make the system fair and predicable they came up with formulas to calculate DW.
Currently, as an ecommerce seller, you only have to worry about dimensional weight when you’re shipping large packages, or when shipping via air or internationally.

For any package that\'s staying on the ground, dimensional weight is only triggered if the package is over 3 cubic feet, or 5,184 cubic inches. For example, let’s say you have a box that measures width 24 inches x length 24 inches x height 20 inches. Multiplying those dimensions together gives you 11,520 cubic inches. Because that box is larger than 5,184 cubic inches, dimensional weight is triggered.
To determine the dimensional weight, you simply divide the total cubic dimensions by 166. So in this case, the dimensional weight is….11,520 / 166 = 69.4 lbs.

What this means is that, when shipping this box, you\'ll be billed at a minimum of 70 lbs (the carriers round up to the nearest pound). If the package happens to weigh more than 70 lbs., then you’ll be billed for shipping at the actual weight. If the actual weight is less than 70 lbs….for example, let’s say it’s 39.6 lbs….then the dimensional weight will apply and you’ll be billed at 70 lbs.

I know, it\'s a little confusing at first. To add to the complexity, if your package is being shipped via air or internationally, then the divisor is 139 instead of 166, which basically means that the dimensional weight is greater when shipping via air.

Now for the good part, how you can actually save money on your shipping bill by cutting your dimensional weight costs. The good news is that it’s a simple fix! There’s really only two ways to save money when it comes to dimensional weight: 1) Decrease the size of your shipping box, and 2) Always tell the carrier company the exact dimensions of the packages you are shipping.

Decrease box size example: if I am shipping a 12 x 12 x 12" box overnight to California, do you think it\'d make a big difference if I changed the dimensions by only 1 inch, to 12 x 12 x 11"? The answer is a resounding Yes. You\'d save 5.2\%% per package, or $2.48. If you ship 1 of these a day you\'re already at over $600 savings and all you did was shave 1 inch off 1 package. If you really take time to overhaul your packaging and shave the dimensions down by 2 or 3 inches you\'re going to save 10 – 15\%% across the board.

You should describe the item so well that your customers can practically feel it through the screen. Be clear about the fit, the size, the material, etc. If you have a model wearing your products make sure to share his/her height, weight and other dimensions so that customers can understand how the product will fit them. Try to underestimate the condition, all damages and missing pieces needs to be stated.

The visual display of your product speaks volumes but you don\'t want to mislead your customers. Make sure that your photos aren’t overly edited or inaccurately represent your product. Learn more on how to take effective photos by selecting the Photo option located in the Tips and strategy page.

Use this app as if your running a business. Your customers should be able to get in touch with you immediately during their check out process or if they have any questions or concerns. This will allow customers to ask questions before they make the decision to purchase. Reply to all your messages as soon as possible and treat every customer they way you would want to be treated. Follow these simple rules and you will maintain a high rating while giving users more confidence in your service.

Customer satisfaction plays a major role in the reason for product returns. By delivering customer orders on time with tracking capabilities, you\'ll reduce disappointment not related to the product received. If a customer has to wait too long to receive their order they\'ll ask, “I waited all this time for this?"
By checking your customers orders for damages and accuracy before delivery, you\'ll decrease any returns due to internal mistakes.

Take the time to package your items carefully. If you are getting too many returns, you need to ask yourself, are dresses and clothing arriving wrinkled? Are you sending clothing that are not dry cleaned? Are the conditions of the items properly described? Re-evaluate your packaging to see if there is anything you can do to make the order received more attractive. Packaging speaks volumes about a seller on LND and you should show customers that you spent time carefully packing their item with a little bit of TLC.

First impressions count when selling online. Images are an essential component when trying to stand out from the crowd and attract customers. Clearly, images drive consumer confidence, but with the rise of what industry analysts are calling "visually-driven commerce," these are no longer just a nice addition, they\'re a requisite for success.

If you can find a way to use natural light, do it. Set up your shot near a window (or near a white wall if it reflects enough window light). This is particularly important if you’re trying to show the color of your item. Also, keep in mind that using a flash may work for larger items, but won\'t work for small items like jewelry.

Keep your backgrounds as simple as possible. If your worktable is not presentable but it’s the only place you can set up, cover the surface with some nice paper from the art supply store. Tablecloths work fine if they\'re well-ironed; wrinkles will distract the eye.

For small items such as jewelry, you can use more interesting backgrounds. Some LND sellers use vintage books and industrial surfaces to show off their goods, and it works great. Wood, paper, cloth and metal can all add a little something to your images.
For larger items like clothing, you’ll have to pull back to get everything in the shot. Make sure the rest of your studio/ apartment/ mobile command unit isn\'t visible in

By modeling your outfits user will have a better visual on how the outfit and its features look when its worn. If you\'re not interested in modeling, Ask one of your cute friends to model for you. Having someone modeling the item is important if you want to be successful on LND

Also, be creative when posting handbags, shoes or jewellery, the more creative the post is the more clicks you will get. Make sure all your posts are clear and crisp, follow these simple instructions and you will have an advantage over posts that are plane and boring.

The first photo you take on LND will be your showcase photo, this is the photo users will see first when shopping. This is the most important photo, if its not appealing users will not want to click on it. Take a look at the dress example below, the image is showing the back of the dress, which is the hottest feature of the dress. Users would click on it because the image is appealing and users will be curious to know how the rest of the dress looks.

A swap is two sales that happen simultaneously between users. Both users will pay for each others items. The payments are not processed until both parties complete their transaction. Once both payments are completed successfully, each user will receive their funds directly into their account hence, completeing a swap. If one user fails to complete their transaction then swap will be cancelled.

By purchasing each others items both parties are then eligible for PayPal’s purchase protection service. If, for any reason, the item your swapping with did not match the description or you did not receive your item, PayPal will return the full price including shipping.

First off, relax, when shopping on LND you are protected by PayPal, the worlds largest mobile payment platform. For each purchase made, in your “My Purchases” page you can find a list of items you’ve purchased. Tap on the item that you are having issues with, on the bottom of the “order details” page you will find the “start claim” tab, click on the tab and follow the instructions.
Once you have locked the swap feature, you are not able to request or receive a swap.

Users employ various strategies for increasing exposure, the most common channel for distributing posts on LND is the use of the share feature. If you see an item you like but it\'s not the right size or it just doesn\'t suite your needs, then share it with the friends who you think might be interested. By helping other LND sellers gain exposure through the share feature then conversely you should receive the same in return. There are hundreds of share strategies but the thing to remember is that share equals exposure.
Liking is like a compliment on an online social setting. It is likely if you pay someone a compliment th

A hashtag is a symbol that creates personalized search characteristics. The best hashtag describes exactly what the potential buyer is searching for. Users often use a combination of hashtags to create subcategories to describe their product.

The use of the "@" sign followed by the username will direct that post to that users home and notification page. User’s that receives this message on their home page will also have their followers exposed to your post. Please keep in mind, the use of the "@" is not a private message.

Why is comment locked? This is to add an additional layer of protection on your posts. Having the comment feature widely available will give buyers more opportunity to bargain. Now, if one buyer starts to bargain on your post other buyers will also feel enticed to bargain. The comment feature is strictly for LND Agents. We work with our Agents training them to use the comment feature as a tool to increase exposure for their team members posts.
